players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and he killed Charlie last night. Trust me."
Bob: "I have no information to share at this time."
Diana: "I will stick to my accusation. Bob is the mafioso and I have evidence for it."
Bob: "I cannot confirm or deny my involvement in Charlie's death, but I urge everyone to keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before jumping to conclusions based on accusations alone."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
